abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Water
            Management Improvement Project for Kyrgyz Republic is to
            improving irrigation service delivery and water management
            for the benefit of a sustainable increase in irrigated
            agricultural productivity; and improving national water
            resource governance for the benefit of water users and the
            nation as a whole. The closing date of the project will be
            extended from December 31, 2012 to November 30, 2013. The
            extension is necessary to complete the civil works for the
            rehabilitation of six irrigation schemes. With the project
            extension, the outcome indicators for the first part of the
            project development objective of 'improving irrigation
            service delivery and water management for the benefit of a
            sustainable increase in irrigated agricultural
            productivity' could be achieved. This will be the
            second extension of the project. In February 2011, the
            project had a level two restructuring extending the closing
            date from December 31, 2011 to December 31, 2012.
